other_tests.findings: Postoperative pathological results confirmed that the tumor cells were epithelioid, spindle-shaped, with nuclei containing vacuoles, visible nucleoli, transparent nuclear membrane, karyolysis, focal necrosis, and rich blood vessels, with some interstitial inflammatory cell infiltration.

Positive expressions of S100 (++, sarcomatoid area: +), CD27 (++, sarcomatoid area: +), CD1a (++, sarcomatoid area: +), Ki67 (35%), CD68 (++), and CD163 (++). Negative expressions in ALK Actin (SM), Desmin, ALKp80, HMB45, Malan-a, CK (pan), Gata-3, CD34, CD30, CD20, CD3, CD21, CD99, CD56, EMA, sox10, CD56, SY, and C123. No tumor invasion of muscular bladder tissue detected.
